email_body: Tim, Thanks for the update. -----Original Message----- From: Heizenrader, Timothy Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2001 11:23 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Cc: Belden, Tim Subject: Here's the forecast that you asked for, updated for reported actuals, mid-Columbia spill participation and an assumption that the current drastic efforts to refill continue through June 10. Not included is the rumored 400 MW-mo of federal lower Columbia spill that's been considered for the May to mid-June time frame.
